New Records: Buddy Hield became the only player in NBA history to make 27 or more threes in his first six games with a team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Warriors looking to improve and contend for a title next spring
Others: Buddy Hield averaging five three-pointers per game on 51.7 percent shooting from downtown
Buddy Hield boasting a career-high of 22.2 points per contest on a comparable 51.6 percent clip from the field
